scripts.prepare-standalone: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const s='.next/standalone';if(fs.existsSync(s)){const c=(a,b)=>fs.existsSync(a)&&fs.mkdirSync(path.dirname(b),{recursive:true})&&fs.cpSync(a,b,{recursive:true}); c('public',s+'/public'); c('.next/static',s+'/.next/static'); console.log('Standalone listo');} else console.log('Ejecuta npm run build antes.');"
scripts.start:standalone: npm run ensure-standalone && npm run prepare-standalone && node .next/standalone/server.js
